mapper.select: SELECT a.createdAt,a.qaId,b.name as userName,b.type as userTypeDB,d.type as qaType,a.qaState FROM qa a LEFT JOIN user b on a.userId=b.userId LEFT JOIN qa_type_detail c on a.qaTypeDetailId=c.qaTypeDetailId LEFT JOIN qa_type d on c.qaTypeId=d.qaTypeId ORDER BY a.qaId DESC
SELECT a.contents, b.pic FROM qa a LEFT JOIN qa_pic b ON a.qaId=b.qaId WHERE a.qaId=#{qaId}
